uk.co.electronstudio.retrowar.screens

Class SimpleTitleScreen

  • uk.co.electronstudio.retrowar.screens.SimpleTitleScreen

  • public class SimpleTitleScreen

    Created by richard on 23/06/2016. GDX screen, i.e. a render loop, used to render the titlescreen
